attributes.action: To ban the sale of Stimulation \ Energy drinks like red bull or kick to Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the PM to ban the sale of Stimulation \ Energy drinks like Red Bull, Kick, or Relentless or other drinks like that to children say under 16 it dose say on the can not sutible for children but they still buy them sometimes 2 or 3 cans at a time
